name: SpreeBoard
summary: SpreeBoard is a plugin keyboard meant to be used in addition to an HID device when one is connected to the iOS device.
description:
Problem: iOS doesn't allow on screen keyboards when an HID(Human Interface Device) is connected to the device via bluetooth. An example is if you need a Bluetooth UPC/Barcode Scanner connected, but also want to allow keyboard input on certain fields or views.

Solution: SpreeBoard acts as an alternate input source that isn't the default iOS keyboard by....
